text: WOWA (93.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of West Salem, Illinois. The station is owned by V.L.N. Broadcasting, Inc., and airs a classic hits format. The station was assigned the WOWA call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on February 20, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * OWA Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Illinois Category:Classic hits radio stations in the United States Category:Edwards County, Illinois
title: WOWA
